long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This one is for all of you Fortnite fans. Space up your chrome with this awesome Fortnite design.



*How to remove Fortnite extension?* 
1. Go to your chrome's settings. 
2. set the addon page. 
3. Select wanted addon off the list. 
4. Press 'remove'. 
5. That's it.
